comments:
Build 20020423

I got the following internal error opening the Configure Tags dialog

STEPS
1) Open the CVS Repositories view on dev.eclipse.org
2) Select jdt-debug-examples
3) Select Configure Tags. You will get the error message and then the following 
error

org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: null argument;

Step #2 refers to the module of that name, not the folder.

I can't reproduce this one. I wasn't able to find a project or module called:
jdt-debug-examples
My mistake - it looks like I should have said jdt-debug

Reproduced only if the connection was dropped, got disconnected, or was really
slow. I've fixed a bug in this case, CVSFolderElement::getChildren should return
a zero length array on an exception instead of null.

Fixed.
